key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and shortages of critical materials
Geopolitical risks from significant presence in Asia, particularly in China and Taiwan
Competitive pressure in the outsourced semiconductor assembly and test (OSAT) industry
controversies: Exposure to geopolitical tensions between the U.S. and China
Potential legal or reputational risks from environmental regulations
environmental_issues: Need to adhere to stringent environmental regulations, increasing operational costs
Commitment to achieving net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2050
social_issues: Job creation through CHIPS Act funding, contributing to local economic development
Workforce adjustments due to COVID-19 impacts
governance_issues: Maintaining significant R&D investments to stay competitive
Ensuring compliance with U.S. CHIPS Act funding requirements
